clinical_study.brief_title: AM-101 in the Treatment of Post-Acute Tinnitus 2
clinical_study.official_title: AM-101 in the Post-Acute Treatment of Peripheral Tinnitus 2 (AMPACT2) - an Open-Label Extension to the TACTT3 Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this research study is to test the safety and local tolerance of repeated treatment with AM-101.

detailed_description.textblock: This open-label extension study is assessing the safety and local tolerance of repeated treatment with AM-101 in subjects previously treated in the scope of the TACTT3 study.

primary_outcome.description: Occurrence of deterioration in hearing threshold in the treated ear(s)

secondary_outcome.description: Difference and occurence of deterioration of hearing threshold in the treated ear(s)

secondary_outcome.measure: Adverse events and serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Occurrence and severity of adverse events and serious adverse events
